about_the_game:
You don't know who you are, you don't know why you're here.
All you know is, you're alive, in apparently a physical mortal shape, and you will need to sustain yourself and explore the world you're in.
Eventually once set, decide what you want to do, and discover the ramifications and hidden powers of this place.

Explore the fantasy world. By harnessing the power of Aether.


Current Demo Gameplay Intended to release
  • Craft new equipment with different materials
  • Take care of your crops with magic or just regular tasks
  • Build your own small shed and start turning it into an encampment
  • Spell casting, just to do minor tasks easier, or destroy your foes
  • Basic weaponry system with several weapons types
  • Animal hunting/tracking
  • Collect the souls of creatures you defeat to enhance your power, or release them to the Aether


The demo is likely to never change after, it is just to give an insight to some people who just want to have fun while experiencing some limited features.

Then we'll public another roadmap once the demo is out.

short_description: You are created as a new soul directly from the Aether, you don't know why you're here or what you're supposed to do. As you start exploring the world, you start making up choices for yourself, and eventually decide how the world around you will evolve with you.
